text: Edward J. Paskey (August 20, 1939 â€“ August 17, 2021) was an American actor. He was best known for playing Lieutenant Leslie on the television series Star Trek from 1966 to 1968. Paskey was born in Delaware, but raised in California. Paskey died on August 17, 2021, three days before his 82nd birthday in Santa Ana, California.Star Trek's Lt.
